name: v0.5.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix typos in bootz.proto by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/152
* Fix chassis typo by @melzhan in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/154
* Update bootz.proto by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/153
* Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.36.0 to 0.38.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/155
* Update README.md - Add section on bootstrapstream rpc by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/156
* Update build to support Bazel 8/bzlmod by @bstoll in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/147

## New Contributors
* @bstoll made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/147

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/compare/v0.4.0...v0.5.0

name: v0.4.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Remove all bazel build files by @melzhan in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/133
* Revert "Remove all bazel build files" by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/138
* Add section on gNSI artifacts in bootz response by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/139
* Update OS Image message with references to sZTP RFC by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/140
* Add fabricname to chassis by @melzhan in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/141
* Add SkipEnrollment flag to control the boot config. by @sam-homa in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/142
* Add a TODO to cleanup the skip_enrollment flag by @sam-homa in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/143
* Add logs by @yvetteyuanw in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/144
* Bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.21.0 to 0.31.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/145
* Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.23.0 to 0.33.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/146
* Add Domain field to Bootz chassis attributes by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/148
* Bump github.com/golang/glog from 1.1.2 to 1.2.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/149
* Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.33.0 to 0.36.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/151
* Add streaming rpc for bootz for support of standard tls certs rather by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/150


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/compare/v0.3.1...v0.4.0

name: v0.3.1
body:
## What's Changed
* update deps by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/137


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/compare/v0.3.0...v0.3.1

name: v0.3.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Add support for rfc8572 DHCP option encoding. by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/128
* Add certz profile id into the bootstrap response. This is required by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/130
* Fix typo CertzArtifact -> CertzProfile by @melzhan in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/131
* Bump google.golang.org/protobuf from 1.31.0 to 1.33.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/132


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/compare/v0.2.1...v0.3.0

name: v0.2.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Cleanup the contradictory wording by @xw-g in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/121
* Update build rule to have proper import path by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/127


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/compare/v0.2.0...v0.2.1

name: v0.2.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Update bootz.proto by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/125
* Regenerate proto files by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/126


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/compare/v0.1.1...v0.2.0

name: v0.1.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Regenerate pb.go by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/3
* skip ov by @xw-g in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/5
* Add section on RMA workflow for control cards by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/4
* Add a simple fake client to Bootz by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/8
* Create a script to generate PDC, OC, OVs and Vendor CA certs. by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/9
* Move server.go, service.go and entitymanager.go to buildable states by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/10
* Hines by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/6
* Golint by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/11
* Implement Entitymanager and populate security artifacts by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/12
* Add verbose logging for server and client activity by @melzhan in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/22
* Adding binary files to .gitignore by @melzhan in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/23
* Add package and remove whitespaces by @melzhan in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/29
* Add proto file for the boot inventry and change inventory manager to load conig from a config file by @mojiiba in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/24
* Add license headers to all files by @melzhan in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/31
* Update comments to fix linter issues when importing to G3 by @melzhan in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/32
* Package comments must start with Package <name> by @melzhan in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/33
* Regenerate Bootz go proto file by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/34
* Correct import renaming for generated protobuf packages by @melzhan in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/43
* add flag for invenory config by @mojiiba in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/44
* DHCP server by @kjahed in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/36
* Entitymanager chassisInventory CRUD operations by @LiamWalsh98 in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/35
* Hash image by @yvetteyuanw in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/49
* OV encoding by @mojiiba in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/39
* Remove dhcp_config field from inventory data as it does not exist in the proto message. by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/53
* Fix lint errors in server/** by @melzhan in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/54
* Authz and oc configuation fix by @mojiiba in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/50
* Add a new common library for ownership vouchers. This will be used by… by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/55
* Refactor server to move logic out of main function. by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/56
* Don't actually start the server during the test. by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/57
* fix lint errors by @melzhan in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/60
* Populate authz file location for local runs. by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/59
* Use new ownershipvoucher package in client and generate.go by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/58
* Use protocmp instead of reflect by @melzhan in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/61
* Rename OwnershipVoucherInner to Inner by @melzhan in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/62
* Use Exitf instead of Exit by @melzhan in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/63
* Use protocmp.Transform() in opts by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/65
* Test failing in Google3 by @melzhan in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/67
* Rename key -> privatekey by @melzhan in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/71
* Bump golang.org/x/net from 0.14.0 to 0.17.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/72
* Move signature creation and verification methods to a common library. by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/73
* Replace direct proto field access with getters.  by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/74
* Rename Signature.Create -> Signature.Sign by @melzhan in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/75
* Sign: Add future support for different crypto standards. by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/79
* Add a new field 'serialized_bootstrap_data' and deprecate the old one. by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/78
* Use signature methods in entitymanager_test by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/80
* Add DNS name to certificate generator and regenerate. by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/81
* Reconnect to server with the provided server trust cert. by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/82
* Bump google.golang.org/grpc from 1.56.2 to 1.56.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/84
* Create typo.yml by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/85
* Correct function name in error message. by @chuckx in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/87
* Use base64-encoded DER PinnedDomainCert in OwnershipVoucher instead of PEM format. by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/86
* Generate all Bootz artifacts on demand instead of storing them locally. by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/92
* Return Owner Cert as a CMS structure instead of PEM encoding by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/90
* Update READMEs and add default values to flags by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/93
* Update README.md by @sam-homa in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/95
* Refactor EntityManager to use a slice of Entities instead of a map. by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/96
* Make client device configurable by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/97
* Update Bootz proto fields with more documentation. by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/98
* Add a new "Chassis" message to Bootz proto. by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/99
* Actually return the error from EntityManager.Sign() by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/100
* bootz fp test required changes by @mojiiba in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/101
* Add missing comments to server.go by @melzhan in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/102
* Refactor ResolveChassis() to return a bpb.Chassis. by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/104
* Add additional fields to EntityLookup: IP address and hardware model. by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/107
* Include resolved bpb.Chassis in GetBootstrapData method. by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/108
* Fix comment formatting by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/109
* Adding design by @melzhan in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/110
* Add a new helper function "buildEntityLookup" by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/111
* Allow SetStatus() to be called on unseen control cards by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/112
* Remove Chassis from proto and instead implement it as a struct. by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/114
* Add a new field `slot_id` to control card and deprecate the old. by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/113
* Bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.14.0 to 0.17.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/117
* Populate Chassis data when resolving the chassis. by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/118
* Update design.md by @melzhan in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/119
* Pass the resolved Chassis object to Sign(). by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/120
* Support XML encoding in addition to JSON for ownership vouchers. by @gmacf in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/124
* Add CLI clarification by @xw-g in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/123

## New Contributors
* @xw-g made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/5
* @gmacf made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/8
* @melzhan made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/22
* @mojiiba made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/24
* @kjahed made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/36
* @LiamWalsh98 made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/35
* @yvetteyuanw made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/49
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/72
* @chuckx made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/87
* @sam-homa made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/95

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/compare/v0.1.0...v0.1.1

name: v0.1.0
body:
## What's Changed
* add bootz proto by @marcushines in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/1

## New Contributors
* @marcushines made their first contribution in https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/pull/1

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/openconfig/bootz/commits/v0.1.0
